metadata.name: SEL Only Template
metadata.description: This template contains advanced SEL expressions that intelligently limit and filter out low-quality streams (like CAM, TS, TC, SCR) and lower resolutions when higher quality alternatives are available. It uses conditional logic to dynamically exclude streams only when better options exist, preventing the loss of all streams for titles with generic names. Inspired by Tamtaro's work.
metadata.author: Vidhin05

excludedStreamExpressions: count(type(cached(streams), 'debrid','usenet')) >= 5 ? count(resolution(cached(streams), '2160p','1440p','1080p')) >= 10 ? resolution(streams, '720p','576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown') : count(resolution(cached(streams), '2160p','1440p','1080p')) >= 10 ? resolution(streams, '720p','576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'): count(resolution(cached(streams), '2160p','1440p','1080p','720p')) >= 10 ? resolution(streams, '576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown') : [] : []

merge(count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray REMUX'),'2160p'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray REMUX'),'2160p'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray REMUX'),'1440p','1080p'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray REMUX'),'1440p','1080p'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray REMUX'),'720p','Unknown'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray REMUX'),'720p','Unknown'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray'),'2160p'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray'),'2160p'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray'),'1440p','1080p'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray'),'1440p','1080p'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray'),'720p','Unknown'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'Bluray'),'720p','Unknown'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'WEB-DL'),'2160p'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'WEB-DL'),'2160p'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'WEB-DL'),'1440p','1080p'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'WEB-DL'),'1440p','1080p'), 2) : [], count(cached(resolution(quality(streams,'WEB-DL'),'720p','Unknown'))) > 2 ? slice(resolution(quality(streams,'WEB-DL'),'720p','Unknown'), 2) : [])
